displayName: Rain – The Good Kind of Dramatic
dialogueLines: I love the smell of rain — it’s like the world hits reset.
I used to dance in the rain when I was little. My mom would yell, but secretly she’d record me on her phone.
You know what’s funny? I still hum the same song every time it rains — ‘Raindrops Keep Fallin’ On My Head.’ Don’t act like you don’t know it!
I brought my favorite blue umbrella today — though it’s technically more of a kind of purple now because I spilled grape juice on it last week.
I always imagine this scene in a movie — two people sharing one umbrella, one of them pretending not to be cold but totally shivering.
Don’t look at me like that, I’m fine!
Oh, and I made hot chocolate before coming here, but of course I forgot to bring it. I even added those tiny marshmallows!
You know, people say rain makes some people sad, but it makes me… dramatic. The good kind of dramatic.

questions.questionText: Which song do I hum when it rains?
choices: Raindrops Keep Fallin’ On My Head
questions.correctResponse: Exactly! ‘Raindrops Keep Fallin’ On My Head.’ Don’t pretend you didn’t sing along in your head.
questions.wrongResponse: No… it was ‘Raindrops Keep Fallin’ On My Head.’ You forgot my rainy-day anthem!

questions.questionText: What color is my umbrella now?
questions.correctResponse: Right! It’s kind of purple now — thanks to my grape juice disaster.
questions.wrongResponse: Nope! I said it’s kind of purple now, not blue!

questions.questionText: What made my umbrella change color?
questions.correctResponse: Correct! I spilled grape juice on it. A very artistic accident.
questions.wrongResponse: No… I said grape juice made it purple! Pay attention next time!

questions.questionText: What hot drink did I make before coming here?
questions.correctResponse: Yes! Hot chocolate with tiny marshmallows — which I *forgot* to bring.
questions.wrongResponse: No… it was hot chocolate. Don’t act like you weren’t craving it too!

questions.questionText: What kind of dramatic did I say rain makes me?
questions.correctResponse: Right! The good kind of dramatic — like main-character energy dramatic.
questions.wrongResponse: Nope! I said the good kind of dramatic. You really weren’t listening, huh?
